sentence_zh_TW: 在進行任何手術之前，醫生必須評估移除某些組織對患者健康的影響。
sentence: Before any surgery, doctors must assess the ______ of certain tissues on the patient's health.

sentence_zh_TW: 藝術家使用多種媒材呈現他的作品，以便表達自身的情感和思想。
sentence: The artist used various materials to ______ his work, in order to express his emotions and ideas.

sentence_zh_TW: 越來越多的人選擇租賃房屋，而不是購買，因為這樣可以減少財務壓力。
sentence: More and more people choose ______ properties instead of buying, as it can reduce financial pressure.

sentence_zh_TW: 借款後，他努力設法償還所有的債務，以免給家人帶來壓力。
sentence: After borrowing money, he worked hard to ______ all his debts to avoid putting stress on his family.

sentence_zh_TW: 在美國，共和黨的政策與民主黨的政策有著顯著的差異，反映了兩者的不同理念。
sentence: In the United States, ______ policies differ significantly from those of the Democratic Party, reflecting differing ideologies.

sentence_zh_TW: 在家族中，兄弟姐妹間往往會有相似性，這表現在外貌和性格上。
sentence: In families, there is often a ______ among siblings, noticeable in both appearance and personality.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個城市的水庫儲存著大量的水源，以滿足居民的需求.
sentence: The city's ______ stores a large amount of water supply to meet the needs of the residents.

sentence_zh_TW: 每個居民都必須在自己的居所登記，這樣政府才能提供相應的服務。
sentence: Each resident must register at their ______ so that the government can provide appropriate services.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個社區的居民非常關心環境保護問題，積極參與各種活動。
sentence: The ______ of this community are very concerned about environmental issues and actively participate in various activities.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個地區的住宅的區域規劃非常合理，適合家庭舒適的生活。
sentence: The ______ zoning in this area is very reasonable, suitable for families to live comfortably.

sentence_zh_TW: 每到假期，家人們都會聚集在一起，前往渡假村度過美好的時光。
sentence: During holidays, families gather together to visit a ______ and enjoy quality time.

sentence_zh_TW: 在進行這項研究時，受訪者的回應對結果的準確性至關重要。
sentence: In conducting this research, the ______'s replies are crucial for the accuracy of the results.

sentence_zh_TW: 應聘者在面試時需交上簡歷，以展示自己的經歷和能力。
sentence: Applicants are required to submit their ______ during the interview to showcase their experience and skills.

sentence_zh_TW: 隨著電子商務的興起，許多傳統零售商不得不調整其經營模式以適應變化。
sentence: With the rise of e-commerce, many traditional ______ have had to adjust their business models to adapt to changes.

sentence_zh_TW: 公司的收入不斷增長，這使得他們能夠擴大業務和投資新的計劃。
sentence: The company's ______ has been growing steadily, allowing them to expand their business and invest in new projects.

sentence_zh_TW: 雖然這款產品的價格較高，但其高價品質吸引了許多消費者。
sentence: Although this product has a ______ price, its high-quality standards attract many consumers.

sentence_zh_TW: 醫生根據患者的病情開處方，以幫助他們迅速康復。
sentence: The doctor will ______ medication based on the patient's condition to help them recover quickly.

sentence_zh_TW: 患者需要憑藉處方去藥局領藥，確保得到正確的藥物。
sentence: The patient needs to take the ______ to the pharmacy to ensure they receive the correct medication.

sentence_zh_TW: 在總統任期的最後幾個月，人民期盼著各種政策的改革能夠實現。
sentence: In the last few months of the ______, the people hope that various policy reforms can be realized.

sentence_zh_TW: 總統的演講包含了對未來方向的深刻見解，激勵了全國人民。
sentence: The ______ address included profound insights into future directions, inspiring the entire nation.
